item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 19, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. A Map of British Dialects (2023) (110 points | 57 comments)
2. Show HN: New world record – verified Goldbach Conjecture up to 4*10^18+7*10^13 (134 points | 63 comments)
3. Show HN: Undercutf1 – F1 Live Timing TUI with Driver Tracker, Variable Delay (107 points | 27 comments)
4. Neurite (8 points | discuss)
5. 15,000 lines of verified cryptography now in Python (380 points | 106 comments)
6. Restoring the Galaxian3 Theatre 6, 1992 six player arcade machine (29 points | 5 comments)
7. Full Text Search of US Court records (319 points | 57 comments)
8. Peru's ancient irrigation systems turned deserts into farms because of culture (47 points | 3 comments)
9. Micro Wheeled legged Robot (12 points | discuss)
10. Show HN: I made a Doom-like game fit inside a QR code (454 points | 121 comments)
11. Demo "The Mind" by Haujobb and Sweet16 (4 points | discuss)
12. JavaScript Views, the Hard Way – A Pattern for Writing UI (112 points | 72 comments)
13. High time to tackle drug-resistant fungal infections (68 points | 18 comments)
14. Understanding the Origins and the Evolution of Vi and Vim (210 points | 87 comments)
15. Cozy video games can quell stress and anxiety (452 points | 262 comments)
16. AI-Designed Antivenoms: New Proteins to Block Deadly Snake Toxins (56 points | 9 comments)
17. Android phones will soon reboot themselves after sitting unused for three days (5 points | discuss)
18. Hands-On Large Language Models (111 points | 7 comments)
19. Ocean Iron Fertilization (64 points | 50 comments)
20. A star appears to have collapsed straight into a black hole without supernova (2017) (42 points | 12 comments)
21. Center Pieces and Lunch Sets in Crochet Work (1915) (11 points | 2 comments)
22. Hypertext TV (176 points | 22 comments)
23. How a yacht works: sailboat physics and design (230 points | 64 comments)
24. Cyberpunk 1958: The Early Days of the Polish IT Industry (152 points | 20 comments)
25. Hydrogen vs. Battery Buses: A European Transit Reality Check (62 points | 119 comments)
26. Investigating the Luna-Terra Collapse as a Temporal Multilayer Graph (23 points | 5 comments)
27. Defold: cross-platform game engine (370 points | 154 comments)
28. UML diagram for the DDD example in Evans' book (105 points | 59 comments)
29. There's Life Inside Earth's Crust (110 points | 37 comments)
30. Judge Rules Blanket Search of Cell Tower Data Unconstitutional (432 points | 163 comments)
